name: You Are Two (zeu)
description:
The prototype of the alpha demo for beta early access.

VR  game about blades, and all the wonderful things you can do with two sticks glued to your hands. In the abstract world of your own brain. Defend against incoming wawes of your thoughts.

YOU find yourself standing on a tiny island surrounded by only water and digital face projection of MOBI. You are tasked with defending your island and not getting killed in the process. 

ARE  blades wielding hero that this universe deserves. Collect energy to charge up your blade to fight off waves filled with your worst nightmares.

BREATHTAKING. As this whole community that is pushing VR gaming to the next level. Great job everyone!  VR is amazing technology, lets spread it out.

It’s NOT a rhythm game, I wanted to focus on adding new interaction,  enemies, and all cool things you can do with blades. 

Aiming to build highly polished, community fueled, fast-paced action VR game that is great for a workout. 

Consider donating. If you like the game and want to see more. I went all-in on working on this,  running out of savings, so every donation really helps.

Hit me on Discord to chat about VR,  game dev,  Unity, new game features, bugs you found, or anything else. Most importantly let me know if you like the game and want to see more. Link: https://discord.gg/p379Nb8

Credits:

Dysko - Framewerk powering this game + music https://soundcloud.com/dysko/

Beeple - C4D projects that I shamelessly “borrowed” and used as background. https://www.beeple-crap.com/

Gabriel Aguiar - he does a lot of amazing visual effects tutorials. If you are dev, go check him out.
